description.value:
+10 to any Battlefield Awareness and Battlefield Manoeuvring Tests Medals can't be acquired, only earned, benefit applied to the whole squad. Looks Like an etched brass strip with a tripartite ribbon

Requirements

Distinguished Service Medal: Awarded for being a part of a Massive Battle that would have been lost without the actions of the squad.

Effect: Special

Notes: -
